title: Reddit has Redditors, what's the Ruqqus equivalent?

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

It's "Ruqqas"

body: I don't think ruqqus users should be called anything other than ruqqus users.  I never liked the term Redditor or considered myself a Redditor even though I was on that site every day, albeit more as a consumer than a poster.  Being on Reddit or ruqqus or any other site does not define who I am.
body_html: I don't think ruqqus users should be called anything other than ruqqus users. I never liked the term Redditor or considered myself a Redditor even though I was on that site every day, albeit more as a consumer than a poster. Being on Reddit or ruqqus or any other site does not define who I am.

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.
